title: Biore Deep Pore Charcoal Cleanser, 6.77 Ounce
description: Biore deep pore charcoal cleanser targets deep-down impurities to defend against daily buildup - like dirt, oil and make-up - for a truly deep clean. Naturally purifies and deep cleans. Draws out and traps 2x more dirt and impurities than a basic cleanser. Provides deeply cleaned, tingly-smooth skin. Contains natural charcoal.

title: Freeman Facial Charcoal & Black Sugar Polish Mask 6 oz.
description: Charcoal Helps Absorb Oil And Impurities Purifying Mask & Smoothing Exfoliant Black Sugar Helps With Exfoliation Perfect For All Skin Types Dual Action Formula

title: Freeman Feeling Beautiful Facial Clay Mask, Chocolate & Strawberry 6 fl oz (150 ml)
description: Tone skin and diminish the appearance of large pores with oil-absorbing clays. Delight in delectable Chocolate and Strawberry while Shea and Cocoa Butter moisturize for smoother, softer skin. Perfect for normal to dry skin.
